snippet: The challenge was to describe a blood pressure measuring device that is long-lasting, portable and easy to use. Here are some of the best responses.
lead_paragraph: The challenge was to describe a blood pressure measuring device that is long-lasting, portable and easy to use. Here are some of the best responses.

headline.main: A Small Fix for Hypertension: Readers Weigh In
